response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,000,000 to you and represents a significant investment in your future. I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000, which I believe is a fair and advantageous deal considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. I trust this offer will enable you to secure a valuable asset at an attractive price. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 900000}
